participant_1.background:
I usually wear comfortable clothes when I visit India because I am there to relax.
I'm not a big exerciser because I get anxious when I push myself too hard.
i enjoy making 3d models for video games and animations.
I enjoy movies that are full of suspense and mystery.
i recently had knee surgery.

participant_2.background:
I like to analyze my friends' behavior and try to understand their motivations.
I enjoyed listening to my neighbors' conversations while I was mountain biking last year.
i just want my voice to be heard.
i enjoy eating italian food.
I am often in pain so I read to distract myself.

content.text: Hello there, I enjoy watching movies full of suspense and mystery. What about you?
I also enjoy those types of movies, and I like to analyze my friends' behavior and try to understand their motivations.
That sounds fun, I like to analyze people too. I recently had knee surgery and I'm not a big exerciser because I get anxious when I push myself too hard.
I'm sorry to hear about your knee surgery. I hope you have a speedy recovery. I enjoy eating Italian food and I'm often in pain so I read to distract myself.
Thank you, I am recovering well. I love Italian food too! What are your favorite Italian dishes?
I love pasta, pizza, and gelato. What about you?
I love all of those things too! I also enjoy lasagna and chicken parmesan.
Those sound delicious! I'm glad we have similar tastes in food.
Me too! I think we would get along well.
I think so too! We should hang out sometime.
That would be great! I'm free this weekend.
Me too! I'll see you then
